synopsis.text: Dr. Yung, a mysterious Pokémon scientist, has developed the revolutionary "Mirage System" - a technology that can use computer data to recreate holographic versions of extinct Pokémon like Kabutops and Armaldo. He invites Pokémon experts Professor Oak and Ash Ketchum, along with Ash's friend Misty, to his lab for a demonstration. Initially awed by the technology, things take a shocking turn when the system malfunctions during a battle, materializing a rogue Mirage Aerodactyl that kidnaps Dr. Yung. A villainous figure called "The Mirage Master" then appears, announcing his plot to exploit the unstable system to engineer unbeatable Pokémon. With Dr. Yung captured and the technology hijacked for evil means, Ash, Misty and Professor Oak find themselves in a race against time to shut down the Mirage System, defeat the Mirage Master, and rescue Dr. Yung. Little do they know, the mythical Mew has taken an interest in these events as well...
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
